tasks.title: Count the tables 1️⃣2️⃣3️⃣
tasks.description: Guests may come and go (especially after lunch), but the tables will always be there. Go around the room and count the number of tables where a guest may sit. (do not count the head table - they are not guests)

tasks.title: Awww... so cute! 🥹🫶
tasks.description: Rasika and Savidu have put a lot of effort into making this day a reality. Show your appreciation by taking a photo of them inside a heart made with your hands (can even be one hand). Upload the photo as proof. Feel free to be creative!

tasks.title: Whoa that's tiny person! 👶
tasks.description: This wedding has like a 160 people (or something like that I can't remember). Some of them are very old (like you), some are very young (like a baby). But there is one guest who is younger than all the others. Find the youngest guest's name.

tasks.title: But first... let me take a (group) selfie 🤳
tasks.description: I'm sure you didn't attend this wedding alone. If you did, I'm really sorry. I can be your friend <3. But anyway, if you're in a group - take a group selfie and upload to complete this challenge! Note: two group members cannot upload the same picture.

tasks.title: Wow that's so yummy! 🍽️
tasks.description: Sri Lankan weddings are known for their delicious food. Hopefully this wedding is one of them. Take a photo of your plate with the food you're eating. Try to get the happy couple in the background if you can ;)

tasks.title: Guests across borders 🌍
tasks.description: This wedding is a melting pot of cultures. We counted, and there are guests from 11 different countries Take a photo with a guest who is from a different country than you.

tasks.title: Time to dance! 💃🕺
tasks.description: The DJ is playing your favorite song. You can't resist the urge to dance. Take a photo of the dance floor. See if you can get the bride and groom in the background!

tasks.title: In this world of AI 🤖
tasks.description: The world is changing. AI is taking over. But we can still have fun with it! Ask ChatGPT to give Rasika and Savidu its best wishes for their life ahead. Upload a screenshot of the chat.
